mapper.sql: id,hot_id,goods_pid,percentage,begin_time,end_time,create_time, DATE_FORMAT(begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as begin_time, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as end_time, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as create_time,admin_id,sort
mapper.select: select a.id,a.category_name,a.show_name,a.show_img,a.is_on,a.sorting,a.hot_type,a.view_more_url, a.admin_id,b.admName,DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as create_time,a.update_admin_id, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as update_time,a.web_site from hot_category a left join admuser b on a.admin_id =b.id where a.id = #{id}

select count(0) from hot_category where 1=1 and hot_type = #{hotType} and (show_img = #{showImg} or show_name = #{showName})
and id != #{id}

select id,hot_id,goods_pid,percentage,begin_time,end_time,create_time, DATE_FORMAT(begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as begin_time, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as end_time, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as create_time,admin_id,sort from hot_goods_discount where hot_id = #{hotId} and goods_pid = #{pid}
select count(0) from hot_goods_discount where hot_id = #{hotId} and goods_pid = #{pid}
select count(0) from hot_goods_evaluation where goods_pid = #{goodsPid} and sku_id = #{skuId}

select aa.*,bb.id as discount_id,bb.percentage as discount_percentage, DATE_FORMAT(bb.begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as discount_begin_time, DATE_FORMAT(bb.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as discount_end_time,bb.sort as discount_sort from (select b.enname as show_name,a.selling_price,a.wholesale_price_1,a.wholesale_price_2, a.wholesale_price_3,a.goods_img,a.hot_selling_id,a.goods_url,a.goods_pid, b.wprice goods_price,b.range_price rangePrice,b.sellunit goods_unit,b.isNewCloud,a.profit_margin,b.morder,a.asin_code,a.amazon_price, b.price,b.is_sold_flag,b.feeprice from hot_selling_goods a,custom_benchmark_ready b where a.hot_selling_id in(select id from hot_category where hot_type = #{hotType} and is_on = 1) and a.is_on = 1 and a.goods_pid = b.pid and b.valid =1) as aa left join hot_goods_discount bb on aa.goods_pid =bb.goods_pid and aa.hot_selling_id =bb.hot_id where 1=1
and (now() >= bb.begin_time AND bb.end_time > now())
order by bb.sort desc
order by profit_margin desc

select a.id,a.class_name as className,a.json_name as jsonName, a.admin_id as adminId,b.admName as adminName,a.update_admin_id as updateAdminId,c.admName as updateAdminName, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as updateTime from hot_class_info a left join admuser b on a.admin_id = b.id left join admuser c on a.update_admin_id = c.id where 1=1
and a.id = #{id}
and a.class_name = CONCAT('%',#{className},'%')
and a.json_name = CONCAT('%',#{jsonName},'%')
mapper.update: update hot_class_info set class_name = #{className},json_name = #{jsonName},update_admin_id = #{updateAdminId} where id = #{id}
